question:
Which among the following comes under the National Ayush Mission(NAM)?
1.AYUSH Services  
2.AYUSH Educational Institution  
3.Quality Control of AYUSH Drugs
Choose the correct option from the choices given below:
explanation:
National AYUSH Mission (NAM) comprising of:  
(i) AYUSH Services  
(ii) AYUSH Educational Institution  
(iii) Quality Control of AYUSH Drugs
